rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hi! Perfect timing.
I want to give you something!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0002
rows.name:
Look, our very first actual find as
salvagers! I want you to have it!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0003
rows.name:
No idea what it is, but I bet you'll
find a use for it somehow!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0004
rows.name:
We all decided together that we'd make
the first thing we salvaged ourselves
a present to you guys!

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0005
rows.name:
If it weren't for you, we'd never have
got these salvager jobs, after all.

rows.label: tlk006101_09_msg0006
rows.name:
We'll work hard to repay our debts,
you can count on that!
